attacks.name: Sound Waves
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Flitter
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. Don't apply Weakness and Resistance. (Any other effects that would happen after applying Weakness and Resistance still happen.)
